promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary ostrich psychic-type pokemon with a regal beak. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or ostrich. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regabeakon, a a gigantic legendary ostrich psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Balloon Burst. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ostrich", "psychic" or "Regabeakon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, ostrich-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This legendary bird uses its immense beak to predict future events. Mostly sighted amidst citadel-like locations, it employs Balloon Burst for defense.
